scripts.base: docker build --no-cache -t node-red-app-webserver-base -f Dockerfile.base . && docker tag node-red-app-webserver-base tlodge/node-red-app-webserver-base && docker push tlodge/node-red-app-webserver-base
scripts.release: docker tag node-red-app-webserver tlodge/databox-sdk-red && docker push tlodge/databox-sdk-red
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run docker && npm run release
